website_summaries.verdict: An all-around elegant shoe at a very nice price, this option fits well in both casual and formal settings.
pros: Comes in a wide range of colors, from British tan to black smooth
An elegant and comfortable fit, perfect for business casual to formal wear
cons: Shoe is a little on the narrow side
Some buyers have raised issues with its durability

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Knock Off, Look Good but Don't Last
customer_reviews.text: I've had these shoes for about 8 months and wear them once or twice a week. In less than 80 wears, the upper, which is clearly not 100% leather, has started to crack and peel. The material also buckles while walking which is uncomfortable. I give this shoe 2 stars because it's still very stylish and looks like the true Calvin Klein model at 1/3 the cost, but they last 1/5 as long. I will not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: bradvukich

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes! Looks great and fits great (so far). I'm mainly using these in the office, but they're very comfy, and appropriate, for any business casual/formal setting. Some reviewers mentioned that it's too narrow - its's not. It's a medium (M) width shoes - that's how they're supposed to be. You definitely want to wear these with dress socks - these are dress shoes, folks! Anyway, couldn't be happier with the built, quality, and style. Great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: YI

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying I do not have a wide foot whatsoever. That being said, these were extremely narrow on my foot. There was no hope that these would relax/stretch out enough to be comfortable. It's a shame because the look and feel were great. Seemed like it was a good shoe but it was just way too narrow in the toe box to even tolerate for more than a few seconds before causing my foot to cramp.
customer_reviews.author: mtorres

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, comfortable shoe, horrible durability
customer_reviews.text: I wear these 2-3 days a week since October 2018, it's now February 2019 and the soles are completely separating from the shoe and cracking around the cap of the toe. Never been wet or ran in. Only a short walk into and out of work 2-3 days out of the week. Really a shame since these are very comfortable shoes that fit exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe but not durable/long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the shape of the shoe. An Oxford like an oxford should be but it only lasted me 6 months or less. I normally expect shoes to last me a year at least. Granted I am a heavy user and move more than normal office people. Just be wary of that. If you expect to wear it once in a while, it probably will last you longer.
customer_reviews.author: Usama

customer_reviews.title: Not Leather.....
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe, however upper leather is hard is more hard man made materials. I ended u getting blisters on back of my heel due to difficult break in of shoes. Very uncomfortable pair of shoes ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: md

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this shoe as it does not hold up to normal wear and tear. I purchased in late August 2019 and wear roughly 2-3 times per week. They are cracking and splitting along the flex points. I have another pair of Calvin Klein shoes that are magnificent and durable so thought these would be similar however they are far from it making me question there authenticity.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice purchase. I saw the exact same shoes at local store for $75, and here is cheaper. So far I am not extensively wear it, but it is fine for now.
customer_reviews.author: rnotk

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: These defiantly run smaller than most shoes. Make sure to order an entire size bigger than you would normally wear. Other than that these shoes look amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: No stiffness
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and price. Comfort is better than expected, no stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hanington

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I walk a lot and after a few weeks the front would of the shoes wore out, it could’ve been a defect but it definitely isn’t or wasn’t comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Dovid Nimni

customer_reviews.title: Brown professional shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great for the professional work environment, and can also be used both for formal and informal occasions
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Elf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit great but the nose of the shoe is very long. I wear a 12 and I kinda looked like an elf.
customer_reviews.author: M.chapp

customer_reviews.title: Leather peeling off after few months of use
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in these shoes. I was excited to buy them because they looked very nice. Not to mention, I'm a big fan of Calvin Klein products with the exception of these shoes. I bought them in January and wore them maybe two or three times a week to work. So they're barely worn in. That is why it doesnt make sense why the so-called leather is peeling off. I've never been more disappointed in a product by Calvin Klein
customer_reviews.author: Bikram S.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but incredibly stiff
customer_reviews.text: Pros: really stylish, narrowly cut, modern dress shoe. Cons: almost as stiff as a pair of Doc Martens out of the box. They have loosened up some with subsequent wear, but I would still recommend them to be worn with thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: wubh

customer_reviews.title: too large
customer_reviews.text: Too large, it's a shame since they are actually very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Irmes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice -- unobtrusive and comfortable enough to wear as part of a business casual work outfit; looks good enough to pair with suits or formalwear with a quick shine. I was nervous about the fit, but it's actually perfect and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed
customer_reviews.text: So i opened the box i purchased these shoes before but i ended up getting a hole at the bottom of the shoes so i ordered again and when i opened them to go to work , the front of the right shoe was scuffed up pretty bad , which turned black and they are brown shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Gaton

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but too tight
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet, so these shoes are very tight. Almost painful. Length is perfect otherwise and shoe looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Granda

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Look and feel great. Little on the big side for me
customer_reviews.author: M. Parsell

customer_reviews.title: The insul was too thick
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were great quality but too tight I think it is because too much insul. Unfortunately did not fit me
customer_reviews.author: Wilmer Cuadra

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Liked these shoes. Very comfortable and look good on you.
customer_reviews.author: Umair Khan

customer_reviews.title: Fits tight
customer_reviews.text: Fits kinda tight to be my size, had this shoe before and it didn’t fit tight like it does now
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. Wasn't expecting such comfort with a dress shoe. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a wedding. They were very, very cheap in quality. They were already falling apart by the end of the wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Jnew84

customer_reviews.title: Pattern on show is unique does not look like every other shoe
customer_reviews.text: Little tight but there was a option for wide so that's my fault
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Good fit, comfortable, sufficient support and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Low quality shoes. Cracked after 4 months from purchase and shoes are not worn every day. Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: FME

customer_reviews.title: Best gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a friend and he loved it. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Saurin Shah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality nice shine/matt leather Can where all day and be comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are nice..
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are nice...but for the 4 hours I used them my feet were hurting the whole night I couldn't even dance with my girlfriend in the wedding. Can I get a refun ?
customer_reviews.author: javitavi

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this as a gift. It is everything.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel k.

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Men's Benton
product_meta.description: Let the Calvin Klein™ Benton oxfords lead you to a more stylish future. Leather upper with contoured seams and pleated heel counter detail. Squared toe. Traditional lace-up closure for an adjustable and custom fit. Man-made lining is breathable for all-day wear. Molded footbed for light underfoot cushioning and ventilated arch support. Textured outsole provides durable traction. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 1 in Weight: 13 oz Product measurements were taken using size 12, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Let the Calvin Klein™ Benton oxfords lead you to a more stylish future.
Leather upper with contoured seams and pleated heel counter detail.
Traditional lace-up closure for an adjustable and custom fit.

Man-made lining is breathable for all-day wear. Molded footbed for light underfoot cushioning and ventilated arch support. Textured outsole provides durable traction. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 1 in Weight: 13 oz Product measurements were taken using size 12, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
